entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:21 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
